cards.heading: Low Cost and Quick Deployment
cards.description: Since Power Bi Desktop is a part of Microsoft 365, you likely already have access. Deploy in under a day with zero upfront cost.

cards.heading: Self Service Business Intelligence
cards.description: Empower users to create, modify, and explore reports on the fly, reducing reliance on IT and enabling faster, data-driven decisions.

cards.heading: Ready-Made Dashboards
cards.description: Easily connect to popular systems with built-in content packs and pre-configured dashboards, making data visualisation simple right out of the box.

accordionItems.label: What data sources can Power BI connect to?
accordionItems.content: Power BI can connect to hundreds of data sources, including SQL databases, Excel, SharePoint, Dynamics 365, Salesforce, Xero, MYOB, cloud platforms, APIs, and many other business systems. Our team can also build custom connectors when required.

accordionItems.label: Do I need Power BI licenses before starting a project?
accordionItems.content: Not necessarily. We can help assess your current Microsoft 365 environment and recommend the most cost-effective licensing model for your needs. Many organisations already have partial access through existing Microsoft subscriptions.

accordionItems.label: Can you customise dashboards for our specific business needs?
accordionItems.content: Yes. All dashboards we build are fully customised to your business goals, KPIs, and workflows. We work closely with stakeholders to ensure reports are intuitive, relevant, and designed for real-world decision making.

accordionItems.label: Why should I choose SSW for custom software development instead of hiring developers directly or going offshore?
accordionItems.content:
Choosing a consultancy like SSW provides certainty and quality. Unlike hiring individuals or offshoring, SSW offers:

* Proven Expertise: Access to highly vetted, experienced developers (including MVPs and Microsoft Regional Directors) skilled in the latest technologies.
* Repeatable Process: We use established methodologies like Scrum and DevOps to manage risk, ensure transparency, and deliver results predictably.
* Quality Assurance: Our focus on architecture, best practices (documented in SSW Rules), and rigorous processes ensures a high-quality, maintainable final product.
* Reduced Risk: We actively manage the inherent risks of software development through clear communication and iterative feedback loops.

accordionItems.label: What is SSW's development process like, and how involved will I need to be?
accordionItems.content:
We use the Scrum framework, which is an Agile methodology. This means development happens in iterative cycles (Sprints) with frequent opportunities for feedback.

Client involvement is crucial â€“ you (or a designated Product Owner) are considered an integral part of the team. You'll participate in regular meetings (like Sprint Reviews) to see progress, provide feedback, and help prioritize work, ensuring the final product aligns perfectly with your vision and needs.

accordionItems.label: What happens in the free initial meeting?
accordionItems.content: In this meeting, you'll talk with one of our experienced Solution Architects and your Account Manager. You can discuss your project idea, business challenges, and goals. We'll listen, ask questions, offer initial thoughts on potential approaches or technologies, and determine if SSW is the right fit to help you achieve your objectives. There's no obligation.
